text: Brendan Cole (born April 23, 1976) is a New Zealand professional ballroom dancer. From 2003 to 2018, Cole was one of the professional dancers on Strictly Come Dancing. From 2005 to 2009, he was a judge on the New Zealand version of Dancing with the Stars. In 2007, he represented the United Kingdom in the Eurovision Dance Contest alongside Camilla Dallerup. == Personal life == In 2010, Cole married Zoe Hobbs, a British model, who gave birth to their first child on Christmas Day 2012. In March 2018, Zoe gave birth to a second child. == Filmography == Year Title Role 2003—2018 Strictly Come Dancing Professional dancer 2005—2009 Dancing with the Stars New Zealand Judge 2006 Celebrity Love Island Contestant (runner-up) 2007 Just the Two of Us Contestant (runner-up) 2007 Eurovision Dance Contest Representing the United Kingdom 2009 Intrepid Journeys Guest (season 7, episode 7) 2019 Pilgrimage: Road to Rome Participant 2022 Dancing on Ice Contestant (runner-up) == References == Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand entertainers Category:Dancers
title: Brendan Cole
